description: A web search tool using Brave's Search API to find current information on the internet. Performs real-time searches and returns relevant web results including titles, snippets, and URLs. Best for finding recent news, articles, and general web content.
usage_example: Search for recent news about artificial intelligence breakthroughs

description: Search and retrieve academic papers from arXiv, a repository of electronic preprints in physics, mathematics, computer science, and related fields. Returns paper titles, abstracts, authors, publication dates, and PDF links. Ideal for finding research papers and academic literature.

query.description: Search query for papers (can include keywords, authors, or topics)

max_results.description: Maximum number of papers to return

sort_by.description: Sort order: relevance, lastUpdatedDate, or submittedDate

usage_example: Find recent papers about climate change and machine learning

description: Execute SQL queries against a PostgreSQL database. Supports SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE operations. Returns query results in JSON format. Useful for retrieving, modifying, or analyzing data stored in relational databases.
usage_example: Get all users who registered in the last 30 days

description: Read contents from local or remote files. Supports various formats including text files, JSON, CSV, and XML. Can read entire files or specific line ranges. Useful for accessing configuration files, logs, or data files.

file_path.description: Path to the file (local path or URL)

line_range.description: Optional line range to read (start, end)

description: Send messages to Slack channels or direct messages. Supports formatted text with markdown, attachments, and mentions. Can send to specific channels, users, or groups. Ideal for notifications, alerts, and team communication.

channel.description: Channel ID or name (e.g., #general or user ID)

thread_ts.description: Thread timestamp to reply to a thread

usage_example: Send a notification to the engineering team about deployment completion

description: Retrieve current weather conditions and forecasts for any location worldwide. Returns temperature, humidity, wind speed, precipitation, and conditions. Supports both current weather and multi-day forecasts.

location.description: City name, zip code, or coordinates (lat,lon)

units.description: Temperature units: metric, imperial, or kelvin

forecast_days.description: Number of forecast days (0 for current only, 1-7 for forecast)

usage_example: What's the weather like in New York City today?
